"You really will bring it for me?<br>Yea:
"At first, I was at a loss when I first
heard her request but I was right to
discuss it with you!"

"With that, we can finalize preparations
for this year's Valentine's Day! I'm sure
it'll be very popular and booming...!"

"Thank you very much for your help!
Please help me again when there is a
chance!"

"本当にとってきてくれたの？
やったっ、ありがとう！"

"最初、フランカさんの要求を聞いた時は
どうしようー、って頭を抱えたんだけど

"これで今年のバレンタインの準備も

"いつもいつも、ありがとね！
また何かあったらよろしくっ！"
